text: nahin pahunchate allaah ko unake maans aur na unake rakt, parantu use pahunchata hai tumhaara aagya paalan. isee prakaar, us (allaah) ne un (pashuon) ko tumhaare vash mein kar diya hai, taaki tum allaah kee mahima ka varnan karo,[1] us maargadarshan par jo tumhen diya hai aur aap satkarmiyon ko shubh soochana suna den
